com.fuse.ui.extensions

Class TransformerExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fuse.ui.extensions.ExtensionBase
      • com.fuse.ui.extensions.TransformerExtension
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Constrain, Draggable, PinchZoom

    public class TransformerExtension
extends ExtensionBase
    The TransformationExtension bass class provides the smoothing logic for extension to perform common -and safe- tranformation operations op the Node's position, scale and rotation attributes.
